hero.title: Your Pet's Health, Beautifully Tracked
hero.subtitle: PawPrint helps you monitor your furry friend's health, nutrition, and daily care with AI-powered insights.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We're a team of pet lovers and tech enthusiasts dedicated to making pet care smarter and more intuitive.
about.missionText: To empower pet parents with intelligent tools that help them provide the best possible care for their beloved companions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: PawPrint was born when David's cat Potato turned 8 and started showing signs of chronic health conditions. As pet parents ourselves, we experienced firsthand the challenges of keeping track of vet appointments, medications, and health records for our aging furry friends.
story.paragraph2: We realized that while technology had transformed so many aspects of our lives, pet care was still stuck in the past — scattered notes, forgotten appointments, and guesswork about our pets' health.
story.paragraph3: Today, Frank and his cat Lilwhite, along with David and Potato, are building PawPrint to help pet parents stay on top of their pets' health with AI-powered insights, smart reminders, and a supportive community. We're just getting started on our mission to make pet care smarter and more intuitive for everyone.

care.title: Care First
care.description: Every feature we build starts with one question: does this help pets live healthier, happier lives?

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage cutting-edge AI to provide insights that were previously only available to veterinary professionals.

community.title: Community
community.description: We believe in the power of pet parents supporting each other through shared experiences and knowledge.

product.title: Meet PawPrint
product.subtitle: A comprehensive mobile app for modern pet parents

health.title: Health Tracking
health.description: Monitor weight, vaccinations, medications, and vet visits all in one place.

ai.title: AI Health Analysis
ai.description: Get intelligent insights about your pet's health trends and potential concerns.

reminders.title: Smart Reminders
reminders.description: Never miss a vet appointment, medication, or grooming session again.

community.title: Pet Community
community.description: Connect with other pet parents, share tips, and collect adorable pet cards.

demo.subtitle: See PawPrint in action. Fill out the form and we'll get in touch.
